title: docs: troff warnings when building `curl.1` (with groff 1.23.0)
body:
### I did this

Built curl with cmake with `ENABLE_MANUAL=ON` on macOS with Homebrew groff 1.23.0:
```
[...]
Generating tool_hugehelp.c
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:1682: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'a'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:1684: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'n'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3874: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'd'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3878: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'g'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3882: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'm'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3885: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'u'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3889: warning: expected numeric expression, got 's'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3892: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'd'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3894: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'd'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3900: warning: expected numeric expression, got 's'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3903: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'f'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3905: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'd'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:3908: warning: expected numeric expression, got 's'
troff:[...]/docs/curl.1:4832: warning: expected numeric expression, got 'd'
[...same repeated once more...]
Building C object src/CMakeFiles/curl.dir/Unity/unity_0_c.c.o
Linking C executable curl
Built target curl
```

The first two `curl.1` lines referenced by these warnings are:
```roff
.IP \fB"IP address"\fP
```
```roff
.IP \fB"host name"\fP
```


### I expected the following

No warnings.


### curl/libcurl version

master

### operating system

macOS + Homebrew
